019package org.jgrapes.util;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.lang.ref.WeakReference;
023import java.nio.file.FileSystem;
024import java.nio.file.Files;
025import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
026import java.nio.file.Path;
027import static java.nio.file.StandardWatchEventKinds.*;
028import java.nio.file.WatchKey;
029import java.nio.file.WatchService;
030import java.time.Instant;
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.Map;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
037import java.util.logging.Level;
038import java.util.logging.Logger;
039import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
041import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
043import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
044import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged;
045import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
046
047/**
048 * A component that watches paths in the file system for changes
049 * and sends events if such changes occur. 
050 */
051@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
052public class FileSystemWatcher extends Component {
053
054    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
055    protected static final Logger logger
056        = Logger.getLogger(FileSystemWatcher.class.getName());
057
058    private final Map<FileSystem, WatchServiceInfo> watchServices
059        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
060    private final Map<Path, WatchInfo> watched = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
061
062    /**
063     * Creates a new component base with its channel set to
064     * itself.
065     */
066    public FileSystemWatcher() {
067        super();
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Creates a new component base with its channel set to the given 
072     * channel. As a special case {@link Channel#SELF} can be
073     * passed to the constructor to make the component use itself
074     * as channel. The special value is necessary as you 
075     * obviously cannot pass an object to be constructed to its 
076     * constructor.
077     *
078     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's
079     * handlers listen on by default and that 
080     * {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)} sends the event to
081     */
082    public FileSystemWatcher(Channel componentChannel) {
083        super(componentChannel);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Register a path for being watched. Subsequent {@link FileChanged} 
088     * events will be fire on the channel(s) on which the
089     * {@link WatchFile} event was fired.
090     * 
091     * The channel is stored using a weak reference, so no explicit
092     * "clear watch" is required.
093     *
094     * @param event the event
095     * @throws IOException if an I/O exception occurs
096     */
097    @Handler
098    public void onWatchFile(WatchFile event, Channel channel)
099            throws IOException {
100        final Path path = event.path().toFile().getCanonicalFile().toPath();
101        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CloseResource")
102        WatchServiceInfo serviceInfo = watchServices.get(path.getFileSystem());
103        if (serviceInfo == null) {
104            try {
105                serviceInfo = new WatchServiceInfo(path.getFileSystem());
106                watchServices.put(path.getFileSystem(), serviceInfo);
107            } catch (IOException e) {
108                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
109                    () -> "Cannot get watch service: " + e.getMessage());
110                return;
111            }
112        }
113        // Is a parent of a canonical path canonical by definition?
114        Path toWatch = path.getParent().toFile().getCanonicalFile().toPath();
115        synchronized (watched) {
116            if (!watched.containsKey(toWatch)) {
117                try {
118                    watched.put(toWatch, new WatchInfo(
119                        toWatch.register(serviceInfo.watchService,
120                            ENTRY_CREATE, ENTRY_DELETE, ENTRY_MODIFY)));
121                } catch (IOException e) {
122                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
123                        () -> "Cannot watch: " + e.getMessage());
124                }
125            }
126        }
127        watched.get(toWatch).watched.add(new WatchedInfo(path, channel));
128    }
129
130    private void removeWatched(Path directory, WatchedInfo watchedInfo) {
131        synchronized (watched) {
132            var watchInfo = watched.get(directory);
133            if (watchInfo == null) {
134                // Shouldn't happen, but...
135                return;
136            }
137            watchInfo.watched.remove(watchedInfo);
138            if (watchInfo.watched.isEmpty()) {
139                watched.remove(directory);
140            }
141        }
142    }
143
144    private void handleWatchEvent(Path directory) {
145        Optional.ofNullable(watched.get(directory)).map(wi -> wi.watched)
146            .orElse(Collections.emptyList())
147            .forEach(wi -> wi.handleChange(directory));
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * The Class WatchServiceInfo.
152     */
153    private class WatchServiceInfo {
154        private final WatchService watchService;
155        private final Thread watcher;
156
157        private WatchServiceInfo(FileSystem fileSystem) throws IOException {
158            watchService = fileSystem.newWatchService();
159            watcher = new Thread(() -> {
160                while (true) {
161                    try {
162                        WatchKey key = watchService.take();
163                        if (!(key.watchable() instanceof Path)) {
164                            continue;
165                        }
166                        handleWatchEvent((Path) key.watchable());
167                        key.reset();
168                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
169                        logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
170                            () -> "No WatchKey: " + e.getMessage());
171                    }
172                }
173            });
174            watcher.setDaemon(true);
175            watcher.setName(fileSystem.toString() + " watcher");
176            watcher.start();
177        }
178
179    }
180
181    /**
182     * The Class WatchInfo.
183     */
184    private static class WatchInfo {
185        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
186        private final WatchKey watchKey;
187        private final List<WatchedInfo> watched;
188
189        private WatchInfo(WatchKey watchKey) {
190            this.watchKey = watchKey;
191            watched = Collections.synchronizedList(new ArrayList<>());
192        }
193
194    }
195
196    /**
197     * The Class WatchedInfo.
198     */
199    private class WatchedInfo {
200        private final WeakReference<Channel> notifyOn;
201        private final Path path;
202        private Instant lastModified;
203
204        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseVarargs")
205        private WatchedInfo(Path path, Channel notifyOn) {
206            this.notifyOn = new WeakReference<>(notifyOn);
207            this.path = path;
208            updateLastModified();
209        }
210
211        private void updateLastModified() {
212            try {
213                if (!Files.exists(path)) {
214                    lastModified = null;
215                    return;
216                }
217                lastModified = Files.getLastModifiedTime(path).toInstant();
218            } catch (NoSuchFileException e) {
219                // There's a race condition here.
220                lastModified = null;
221            } catch (IOException e) {
222                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
223                    () -> "Cannot get modified time: " + e.getMessage());
224            }
225        }
226
227        /**
228         * Handle change.
229         *
230         * @param directory the directory. Passing it is redundant but
231         * more efficient than deriving it from path.
232         */
233        private void handleChange(Path directory) {
234            // Check if channel is still valid
235            Channel channel = notifyOn.get();
236            if (channel == null) {
237                removeWatched(directory, this);
238            }
239
240            // Evaluate change
241            Instant prevModified = lastModified;
242            updateLastModified();
243            if (prevModified == null) {
244                // Check if created
245                if (lastModified != null) {
246                    fire(new FileChanged(path, FileChanged.Kind.CREATED),
247                        channel);
248                }
249                return;
250            }
251
252            // File has existed (prevModified != null)
253            if (lastModified == null) {
254                // Now deleted
255                fire(new FileChanged(path, FileChanged.Kind.DELETED), channel);
256                return;
257            }
258
259            // Check if modified
260            if (!prevModified.equals(lastModified)) {
261                fire(new FileChanged(path, FileChanged.Kind.MODIFIED), channel);
262            }
263        }
264    }
265}
